text: Wa Dakhala Al-Madinata `Ala Hini Ghaflatin Min 'Ahliha Fawajada Fiha Rajulayni Yaqtatilani Hadha Min Shi`atihi Wa Hadha Min `Aduwihi Fastaghathahu Al-Ladhi Min Shi`atihi `Ala Al-Ladhi Min `Aduwihi Fawakazahu Musa Faqađa `Alayhi Qala Hadha Min `Amali Ash-Shaytani 'Innahu `Aduwun Muđillun Mubinun
